entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is a person who is confused and looking around for trouble. He is hit by Harry's wand and falls to the ground (Chapter 13).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is using his wand to defend himself and others from dementors. He uses an Invisibility Cloak and casts the Expecto Patronum spell (Chapter 13).

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who is trying to warn Harry about Mrs. Cattermole's situation (Chapter 13).

entities.name: mrscattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is a person who is chained to a chair and being attacked by dementors (Chapter 13).

relationships.description: Harry attacks Yaxley with his wand, causing him to fall to the ground (Chapter 13).
Dementors are attacking Mrs. Cattermole, forcing her face back with a slimy hand (Chapter 13).
Harry uses the Expecto Patronum spell to defend against dementors, causing them to abandon restraint (Chapter 13).
